concept.shortdesc: The deprecated title attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the title element.

conbody.p: The titleattribute is available on the map element and specializations of map; the attribute has been deprecated since DITA 1.1.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the title attribute is used in DITA 1.x releases.
section.codeblock: <map title="Bats> <topicref href="bats.dita"> <topicref href="batcaring.dita"/> <topicref href="batfeeding.dita"/> <topicref href="batsonar.dita"/> <topicref href="batguano.dita"/> <topicref href="bathistory.dita"/> </topicref> </map>

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the title attribute can be replaced by the title element in DITA 2.0.
section.codeblock: <map> <title>Bats</title> <topicref href="bats.dita"> <topicref href="batcaring.dita"/> <topicref href="batfeeding.dita"/> <topicref href="batsonar.dita"/> <topicref href="batguano.dita"/> <topicref href="bathistory.dita"/> </topicref> </map>
